product.description:
Herb Pharm’s California Poppy Extract is a natural liquid herbal supplement designed to support relaxation, promote restful sleep, and maintain a healthy nervous system. Crafted from Eschscholzia californica, this extract utilizes the fresh roots, leaves, and flowers of organically grown California poppy plants. These are hand-harvested at their peak and expertly processed to retain their bioactive compounds, including sedative alkaloids. Traditionally used to alleviate stress-related symptoms such as mild anxiety and trouble sleeping, California Poppy Extract also offers antispasmodic properties that may help ease minor cramps and muscle tension.

Each 1 fl. oz. bottle provides a convenient liquid form for fast absorption and ease of use. Simply mix with water or juice to enjoy its potential benefits. With over 35 years of herbal expertise, Herb Pharm ensures that this supplement is non-GMO, gluten-free, and sustainably crafted. Always consult your healthcare provider before use, especially if you are pregnant or have a medical condition.

product.name: Metagenics Tran-Q Sleep - For Stress Management & Sleep Support - With California Poppy, English Lavender & Passion Flower Herb - Melatonin Free - 60 Tablets
product.description: Metagenics' Tran-Q Sleep supports individuals who are seeking a natural approach to improving their sleep quality and managing occasional stress.* This herbal supplement is a blend of botanicals that supports the body's natural processes to foster relaxation and tranquility at bedtime.* The formulation includes 726 mg of passionflower extract, a well-known botanical that has traditionally been used to calm nerves and support relaxation.* In combination with 554 mg of jujube seed extract, this supplement provides a foundation for a calm evening routine.* Tran-Q Sleep also features 250 mg of California poppy extract and 80 mg of English lavender flowering tops oil, both of which are highly regarded for their roles in supporting a relaxed state and facilitating a restful night’s sleep.* The careful selection of these herbal ingredients results in a melatonin-free, drug-free, and hormone-free supplement, offering a pure and natural option for adults seeking calm supplements. Take 1-2 tablets daily with evening meal or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. With a heritage of breakthrough science, innovative products, unsurpassed quality, practitioner education, and dedicated partnerships, it is clear why Metagenics has become one of the most trusted health and wellness brands worldwide. For over 40 years Metagenics has developed high-quality, science-based nutritional supplements, medical foods, and lifestyle programs to support the growing number of people seeking to improve their health and achieve their wellness goals.
